about_the_game:
Adds the MERCIFUL difficulty.

Suggested for beginners or those who want to enjoy the story.
Selectable at New Game. Also changeable at any time from the Config menu.

content_descriptors.notes: Acts of violence, including killing, are depicted, though the use of blood and gore is minimal. Some character designs are provocative. Dialogue uses expletives from time to time.
